I'm having an issue with httpd 2.2.11 and mod_perl 2.0.4.  Whenever I set a MaxRequestsPerChild directive and allow any mod_perl code to run there are Apache children that never die (not all children have this problem).  They get stuck at futex.  I'm attaching a backtrace and a strace of child that got stuck.  I'm at a complete loss to explain what's happening.
